sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1978, ch. 139, § 24, repealed 51-13-8, 1953 Comp. (53-3-7 NMSA 1978), relating to review of assessments, effective January 1, 1979.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text: Recompilations.— Laws 1978, ch. 139, § 23, recompiled 51-13-10, 1953 Comp. (53-3-8 NMSA 1978), relating to additional data, as 51-13-22, 1953 Comp. (53-3-19 NMSA 1978), effective January 1, 1979.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1978, ch. 139, § 24, repealed 51-13-12, 1953 Comp. (53-3-9 NMSA 1978), relating to disposition of amounts collected, and 51-13-12.1, 1953 Comp. (53-3-10 NMSA 1978), relating to refunds, effective January 1, 1979.

sections.heading: to 53-3-17 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1986, ch. 20, § 136D repealed former 53-3-11 through 53-3-17 NMSA 1978, relating to the Franchise Tax Act, effective May 21, 1986. For present provisions,seeChapter 7, Article 2A NMSA 1978.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1979, ch. 390, § 12, repealed 53-3-18 NMSA 1978, relating to late filing of the annual report, assessment and notice of franchise tax, penalties and interest, effective July 1, 1979.

sections.heading: to 53-3-31 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1986, ch. 20, § 136D repealed former 53-3-19 through 53-3-31 NMSA 1978, relating to the Franchise Tax Act, effective May 21, 1986. For present provisions,seeChapter 7, Article 2A NMSA 1978.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1979, ch. 390, § 12, repealed 53-3-32 NMSA 1978, relating to fraud in the payment or collection of the franchise tax, effective July 1, 1979.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1986, ch. 20, § 136D repealed former 53-3-33 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1979, ch. 390, § 10, relating to the Franchise Tax Act, effective May 21, 1986. For present provisions,seeChapter 7, Article 2A NMSA 1978.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1998, ch. 108, § 81 repealed 53-3-34 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1979, ch. 390, § 11, relating to limitations on actions involving franchise taxes, effective January 1, 1999.
